attributes.action: Funding to build association/Council housing not just affordable housing
attributes.additional_details: Improve the living standards of young fmailys living in to smaller property's that cannot afford to buy
attributes.background: Help within funding to build social housing. Housing is being demolished or sold privately to build affordable housing which frankly is not affordable. Association and council tenants are being removed or are living in cramped condition due to the lack of social housing

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573198
